summary: This mod adds 6 unique, lore friendly followers that wander around Skyrim. To install, choose a version then extract to data folder in the main Skyrim directory, or use NMM.
descriptionHtml:
All the followers will be roaming around Skyrim for you to find. Each has a different class and set of skills to the others and they all level with the player.

Arameth: Arameth is a nord ranger/hunter. His skills are mainly marksman and light armour.

Lekor: Lekor is a breton mage, an expert in the school of illusion.

Griswort: Griswort is a redguard warrior. His skills are two-handed and heavy armour.

Lallieth: Lallieth is a thief. Her skills are sneak, archery and pickpocket.

Gro-Skulla: He is an orcish warrior. He focuses mainly on one-handed and heavy armour.

Jerthod: Jerthod is an ex-blades agent. His skills are one-handed and block.
author: Nathan0410
